data.text: @rontkim @POTUS @JoeBiden The reason he chose not to say anything is because, no government wants to be in elder care business. NH are private business for a reason government already proved they are not good at it.

@rontkim @POTUS @JoeBiden ron kim your false talking point is coming to an end. You milked it for personal ambition and abused those that lost loved one by spewing false narrative from fox news. You lied to your constituents. You should resign you disgraceful low life. https://t.co/TBmxvjDFcT

@GrubmanDavis @rontkim @POTUS @JoeBiden I despise being lied to by any of them Cuomo smearing all families, Hochul lying to our faces & if Ron is as well that will be another kick to the gut. My mother could not be removed from there they wouldn’t allow it long story short it was too late I hate she was a pawn in this
@jmh22547 @rontkim @POTUS @JoeBiden By all means hate Cuomo. I don’t care one way or the other. But stop believing in people like Ron

@jmh22547 @rontkim @POTUS @JoeBiden Don’t forget that. He was chair of the committee he could have stopped the immunity provisions or at least raise the issue when the actual budget was being negotiated. He didn’t. He is using door and other families pain for personal political gain. It’s wrong

@jmh22547 @rontkim @POTUS @JoeBiden I am beyond sorry that you lost your mother to this terrible pandemic. And I think Cuomo lying about the numbers is despicable. Especially for political gain while making millions writing a book. But don’t listen to false prophets. Ron was in charge of Aging BEFORE COVID

@jmh22547 @rontkim @POTUS @JoeBiden 75+ percent of all Covid deaths have been people eligible to live in a nursing home, those 65+. The fact is is that less than a third of those people were in nursing homes. Covid kills older people most and fastest. These r facts
@jmh22547 @rontkim @POTUS @JoeBiden Also my grandfather died during the pandemic.
